Chargify is an API Key based integration and does not require the setup of an app. ​ Required Credentials of a Linked Account To successfully connect with the Chargify integration, a Linked Account or an end-user will need to provide the following to connect: API Key Base URL To understand how a Linked Account can get the above mentioned credentials, refer below. ​ Getting Credentials of Maxio Chargify To acquire the required credentials and connect a Linked Account, please follow the steps mentioned below: Log in to your Chargify account . Click on Select a Site dropdown in the side menu and choose a site . Copy the Base URL of your site now. Click on Config in the side menu > Choose Integrations > Select API Keys . Click on the New API Key button and copy the API key displayed. Copy the API Key as it will not be shown again. ​ Actions and triggers In Cobalt, you can create orchestrations of your use-cases using Chargify actions and triggers. Following are the set of Chargify actions and triggers supported by Cobalt. Actions Triggers Customers List Customers - List customers in Chargify. Create Customer - Create a customer in Chargify. Update Customer - Update a customer in Chargify. Delete Customer - Delete a customer in Chargify. Invoices List Invoices - List invoices in Chargify. Get Invoice - Get an invoice in Chargify. Void Invoice - Void an invoice in Chargify. Subscriptions Create Subscription - Create a subscription in Chargify. Find Subscription - Find subscription in Chargify. Update Subscription - Update a subscription in Chargify. Others HTTP Request - Make HTTP API calls to any Chargify documented REST APIs.
